# Detection of Fake Image Generated by GAN(Generative Adversarial Networks)

## build

```shell
docker-compose build
```

## train

```shell
docker-compose run --rm web python main.py
```

## web application

run

```shell
docker-compose up -d
```

access to `http://127.0.0.1:8080`

finish

```shell
docker-compose down
```
